description: Non-material Amendment to planning permission P2014/4884/S73 dated 03/03/2015. The non-material amendment consists of alteration to layout of Site 1 and 2, alterations to the lightwells of seven units, the introduction of a ground floor window and the omission of a window.
decision_conditions:
Condition 2 of planning permission ref: P2014/4884/S73 should read:

CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 


12319_02_00-P1, 12319_02_06-P1, 12319_02_07-P1, 12319_02_08-P2, 12319_02_10-P1, 12319_02_11-P1, 12319_02_13-P1, 12319_02_14-P1, 12319_02_16-P1, 12319_99_45, 12319_00_04-P1, 12319_00_05-P1, 12319_00_06-P1, 12319_00_07-P1, 12319_00_08-P1, 12319_00_09-P1, 12319_00_10-P1, 12319_90_01-P1, 12319_90_02-P1, 12319_90_03-P1, 12319_90_07-P1, 12319_99_46,  13020 032 Rev P2, 034 Rev P2, 035 Rev P1, 037 Rev P1, 13020_035_P1, 13020_036_P2, 13020_038_P2, 13020_039_P1, Planning Statement (received 18/09/2015),  3 Annotated Images of Proposals relationship with 19 Tompion Street, Brunswick Estate - Accommodation Schedule, Code For Sustainable Homes Pre Assessment; Brunswick Estate Daylight and Sunlight Assessment Price and Myers, HTA Brunswick Close Estate Heritage Study, Ecology Survey - The Ecology Consultancy; HTA Health Impact Assessment; Bat Roost Assessment - The Ecology Consultancy, HTA Planning Statement; Arboricultural Impact Assessment - Crown Consultants, Energy Strategy Report - Bailey Garner, Addendum to Design and Access Statement (Cook Associates - November 2014), Addendum to Health Impact Statement (Cook Associates - November 2014) and Addendum to Planning Statement (Cook Associates - November 2014)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
